com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema

Class VertexDegreeDataHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema.SchemaHeap
      • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema.SchemaDataHeap
        • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.heapfile.schema.VertexDegreeDataHeap

  • public class VertexDegreeDataHeap
extends SchemaDataHeap
    Representation of heap file for storage of vertex degree data.
    Author:
    guobao.chen

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VertexDegreeDataTuple createTuple(long externalId, Object data)
      Creates a new HeapDataTuple instance and saves it to heap by specifying its external id and an object, usually an upper layer object like a vertex, edge or its property, which contains all needed data for the tuple to be created.
      VertexDegreeDataTuple deleteTuple(long vertexId)
      Deletes a HeapDataTuple instance permanently from heap file by specifying its external id.

      Updates the number of pages if the specified new value indicates more pages than the existing number
      HeapDataTuple updateTuple(long externalId, Object data)
      Updates an existing HeapDataTuple instance and saves it to heap by specifying its external id and an object, usually an upper layer object like a vertex, edge or its property, which contains all needed data for the tuple to be updated.

        public VertexDegreeDataHeap(String graphName,
                            short vertexSchemaId,
                            GraphDegreeIndex degreeIndex)
        Constructs a new VertexDegreeDataHeap instance by specifying a graph name and id of schema
        Parameters:
        graphName - name of graph
        vertexSchemaId - id of schema
        degreeIndex - id of edge schema for vertex's degree calculation which denotes degrees for specific edge schema or null for all edges
